question: What is the effect of incorporating  degree‐heterogeneous networks structure in an SEIR model on disease dynamics, compared to a homogeneous‐mixing network? Analyze it using both deterministic analytical methods and stochastic simulations
next_plan: Completed discovery, network construction, parameter setting, stochastic simulations on ER (homogeneous‐mixing) vs BA (degree heterogeneous) networks and extracted key epidemic metrics. Next steps: 1) derive and present deterministic analytical comparison (mean-field and degree-based equations) and compute epidemic threshold analytically; 2) integrate analytic findings with simulation outcomes; 3) draft full IEEE-style LaTeX paper including all sections, figures, tables of metrics, and citations; 4) ensure references from literature review. Will proceed to write the Methodology, Results, Discussion, etc., incorporate analytic equations and finalize report in next iteration.
